nodes.text: Klang's Place was a cheap bar in Canto Bight on Cantonica, the kind of bar where criminals like Anglang Lehet liked to hang out. One evening, Anglang brought the tourist Kedpin Shoklop to the bar, where they spent time together drinking crystalmead and talking about their lives. Unbeknownst to Kedpin, Angland slipped a tiny, ingestible, remote-operated nano-detonator into his drink, intending to turn the little Wermal into a living bomb.
